Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="EventId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DebugMessage" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="EventId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DebugMessage" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
%3 shim(s) were applied to driver [%1].
Shim(s) source: %2.
Shim GUID(s): %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ShimSource" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ShimCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AppliedGuids" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Flags [%4] were applied to device [%1] - class [%2].
Flags source: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceClass" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FlagSource" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriverBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DriverSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DriverTimeStamp" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DriverCheckSum" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DriverBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DriverSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DriverObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Pdo" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ServiceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HardwareId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Caller" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Type" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Size" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Tag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Caller" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Tag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Fdo" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Irp" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Fdo" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="DeviceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceCharacteristics" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Exclusive" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Fdo" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Irp" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="MajorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DriverObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Fdo" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Irp" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="MinorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
